sections.name: Pre Change Request
sections.intro:
Cookbooks / References:
- Password Change (v1.7) – Network Locations (2005.2)
- Image Share Permissions

Notes:
- Can start these steps starting 26 Jan
- Create Change Request at least 2 weeks prior
- Assign your name to ctasks before requesting approval
- Send site email notice at least 2 weeks prior
- Do NOT edit nor remove the VHA accounts at this time

items.text: Create a list of active Network Locations that utilize the old VHAxxxIA/IU accounts.
Contact respective system owners to coordinate adding the new OITxxxIA/IU accounts.
Validate new OIT accounts have access to image shares.
Schedule date/time with Clinicomp personnel to perform post account reconciliation actions.

sections.name: Begin Implementation on the Change Request
sections.intro:
Primary Cookbooks:
- Password Change (version 1.x)
- Change IA and IU Accounts (version 1.x)

General Notes:
- These tasks can be completed during business hours unless otherwise specified
- Some tasks must be completed during scheduled downtime
- Background Processor credential update should be done early in the morning

items.text: Reconcile OITxxxIA/IU/IU2 accounts (add to KeePass and RDCM). Close related ctasks.
Add OITAppAdminsCIT3SVC security group to local Administrators and Users groups on BGPs and DIGs/TXTs servers.
Add OITServerAdminsCIT3 security group to all servers’ local Users group.
Add va\oitXXXia full control permissions to C:\DICOM and C:\DICOM\Image_In folders.
Create C:\DICOM\Scratch folders on all DIGs/TXT servers and confirm IA accounts have full control permissions.
Update the Scratch folder in MUMPs on DIGs/TXTs servers.
Update any Network Locations previously annotated utilizing the old VHAxxxIA/IU accounts.
Update Apache Tomcat credentials on HDIGs and VIX.
Update the IRIS service using the new OITxxxIA account.
Sign out of servers, update RDCM with new OITxxxIA credentials, sign back in with new account and restart services. Verify functionality.
Update Iris Management Portal accounts.
Update Lighthouse Web Interface account passwords.
Update Compass Web Interface account passwords.
Update VA\OITxxxIU credentials in BGP Imaging Site Parameters.
Change the VistA Verify Code (Method 1) using OITxxxIU2 password for Verify. Site may need to rerun HDIG Installation Wizard to update VistA credentials.
Restart services.
Update MSP indicating which accounts to reference in CyberArk.
Close out open ctasks. Review and close remaining ctasks to complete the Change Request.
